channel.title: Technolotics Videos
channel.description: Irelands first independent weekly vidcast - Technolotics is an irreverent and humourous look at technology, politics and the media; from a rag tag band of Irish students.
channel.copyright: Creative commons share music, copyleft to Jason McCandless, Gareth Stack
channel.itunes:author: Jason McCandless, Gareth Stack, Francis McGillicuddy
channel.itunes:subtitle: An irreverent look at technology, politics and the media; from a rag tag band of Irish students.
channel.itunes:summary: A humorous show which discusses the latest technology and political developments reported online and in the mainstream media, endeavouring to frame them in greater depth (and with less effort at political 'neutrality') than other podcasts.

itunes:owner.itunes:name: Jason McCandless, Gareth Stack, Francis McGuiligudy
